DOC.brief_summary: Purpose study : To identify whether Electrocardiographic QRS voltage change ( admission pre-discharge ) pre discharge 6- minute walk test patient admit acute heart failure identify patient risk recurrent admission heart failure .
DOC.brief_title: PRospective Evaluation Electrocardiographic Voltage Changes Six Minute Walk Test Predicting Readmissions Heart Failure ( PREEMT-HF Study )
DOC.detailed_description: Primary Objective Determine ability EKG voltage change pre discharge 6-minute walk test ( 6-MWT ) predict repeat heart failure hospitalization ( HFH ) patient admit acute decompensated heart failure ( ADHF ) . Secondary Objectives 1 . Determine ability EKG voltage change pre discharge 6-MWT ) predict composite 1 year mortality HFH patient admit ADHF . 2 . Determine ability proportionate pulse pressure , orthostatic blood pressure change pre discharge inferior vena cava ( IVC ) diameter portable ultrasound predict HFH mortality
DOC.criteria: Patients > 18 year age , admit diagnosis ADHF fulfilling follow criterion : 1 . Evidence systemic congestion ( manifest 2 follow criterion : jugular venous distension , edema , pulmonary rale , Left ventricular S3 , radiographic evidence pulmonary venous congestion ) 2 .
